Package comp3111.popnames

Class DataValidation

java.lang.Object
comp3111.popnames.DataValidation
public class DataValidation
extends java.lang.Object
A class for doing input validation. Use for - Check if some String / value is valid - Get default error message. - Convert a "semi-valid" name string to valid string.

  • Method Details

    • checkYearInRange

      public static boolean checkYearInRange​(int year)
      Check if a year is in range of 1880-2019.
      Parameters:
      year - The year to be checked.
      Returns:
      Return true if the year is in range.
      Return false otherwise.

    • checkPeriod

      public static boolean checkPeriod​(int start_year, int end_year)
      Check if a given period is true.
      Parameters:
      start_year - The given starting year of the period.
      end_year - The given ending year of the period.
      Returns:
      Return true if the period is valid.
      Return false otherwise.

    • checkChoicenOne

      public static boolean checkChoicenOne​(boolean choice1, boolean choice2)
      Check if only one of the two choices is selected. May not needed if use ToggleGroup in the UI.
      Parameters:
      choice1 - One of the two choices. True means selected. False means unselected.
      choice2 - One of the two choices.
      Returns:
      Return true if only one of the two choices is selected.
      Return false otherwise.

    • isValidName

      public static boolean isValidName​(java.lang.String name)
      Check if a given string is a valid name.
      Valid is defined as
      - Not null.
      - Should at least be two characters long.
      - Only contain letters (A-Z and a-z).
      - Must start with one upper case and follow by all lower case.
      Parameters:
      name - The given name to be checked.
      Returns:
      If the given string is a valid name, return true.
      Otherwise, return false.

    • isValidYearString

      public static boolean isValidYearString​(java.lang.String year_in_string)
      Check if a given string is a valid year.
      Valid is defined as
      - Not null.
      - Should be exactly 4 digits long.
      - Only contain number (0-9).
      Parameters:
      year_in_string - The given year in String type.
      Returns:
      If the given string is a valid year string, return true.
      Otherwise, return false.

    • isValidIntString

      public static boolean isValidIntString​(java.lang.String int_in_string)
      Check if a given string is a valid integer.
      Valid is defined as
      - Not null.
      - Only contain number (0-9) and (optional) a negative sign "-" in the front.
      Parameters:
      int_in_string - The given integer in String type.
      Returns:
      If the given string is a valid integer string, return true.
      Otherwise, return false.

    • ChangeToValidName

      public static java.lang.String ChangeToValidName​(java.lang.String name)
      Check if a given string is a valid name.
      Valid is defined as
      - Not null.
      - Should at least be two characters long.
      - Only contain letters (A-Z and a-z).
      - Must start with one upper case and follow by all lower case.
      Parameters:
      name - The given name to be checked.
      Returns:
      If the given string is valid return the it.

      If it is not valid but contain only character (no matter lower / upper case) and space, change it to the format "start with one upper case and follow by all lower case" and return the changed string.

      Otherwise, the name is invalid anyway, return empty string "".
